channel.title: 学习笔记
channel.description: Recent content on 学习笔记

item.description: docker run -p 6379:6379 –name redis -v /root/redis/redis.conf:/etc/redis/redis.conf -v /root/redis/data:/data -d redis redis-server /etc/redis/redis.conf –appendonly yes docker run -itd –name redis -p 6379:6379 -v /root/redis/redis.conf:/etc/redis/redis.conf -v /root/redis/data:/data -d redis redis-server /etc/redis/redis.conf –appendonly yes docker run -itd –name redis -p 6379:6379 -v /etc/redis/redis.conf:/etc/redis/redis.conf -v /data:/data -d redis redis-server /etc/redis/redis.conf –appendonly yes –requirepass qaz521 查看配置文件挂载 # docker inspect redis| grep Mounts -A 20 创建完成设置密码 # docker exec -it redis bash redis-cli config set requirepass 密码
